title: The Fifty-Cent Groom
description: "YOU DON'T KNOW ME, BUT WOULD YOU UNBUTTON MY DRESS?"Ben Northcross had heard some great pickup lines in his time, but this one took the cake, coming as it did from a woman in a wedding gown! A strangely shimmering wedding gown.  "I NEED YOUR BODY FOR ONE NIGHT... " Ben had been intrigued by the surprising Sara Gunnerson. Now he was hooked!  "A HUNDRED BUCKS, PLUS TIPS. " And then she tossed him fifty cents, for a word of advice on how to marry the millionaire she'd set her sights on. Ben couldn't help but wonder: What would the outrageous Sara Gunnerson do next if he agreed to be that man?
author: Karen Toller Whittenburg
